Posts.Content: ddwright wrote: I am confused. Doctor has biopsy results on his desk day 2. Receptionist gave me results saying you good or he would have called you if serious. Now Dr calls and says its inflammation. Has anyone else heard of inflammation causing lumps. I take 200 mg of anti-inflammatory for 3 years now. He said for the sharp pain I am getting try something over counter because breast pain is difficult to treat. Log in to post a reply
